altername_name: Gakken Mainichi no Drill DS: Mezase! Miracle Shougaku 1 Nensei
name: Gakken Mainichi no Drill DS: Mesaze! Miracle Shougaku 1 Nensei
overview: Gakken Mainichi no Drill DS: Mesaze! Miracle Shougaku 1 Nensei is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Gakushuu Kenkyuusha, which was released in Japan in 2008.
